ygData.subject: RE: Lvls After Expansion Pak
ygData.msgSnippet: isnt this a bit....ridiculous?  First off....are they EVEN GAINING EXP after 50?  and if so....its damn hard enough....killing drags etc.  Not to
ygData.messageBody:
isnt this a bit....ridiculous? First off....are they EVEN GAINING EXP after
50? and if so....its damn hard enough....killing drags etc. Not to
mention....whathappens when the bar fills completely? does it restart?
Unless you can answer me.....please....dont write this kinda philisophical
crap.


Bann

-----Original Message-----
From: John Erik Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 2:19 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com; EQ_Cleric@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Lvls After Expansion Pak


From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>

Ok some ppl are wondering what will happen to ppl thats already on Lvl 50
and are still playing it. What will become of all the exp they gained after
they got Lvl 50? I think it would be dumb of Verant to allow them to go
from 50 to what ever Lvl just cause they have enough exp too. Think about
it, would you wanna install the expansion pak just to see "You moved up a
level(s), Welcome to level 60!" or higher? What fun would that be?
Like one said what if the lvl cap will be say 60 and when you install the
pak you find out you had enough exp to hit Lvl 60? Wouldn't we all want to
earn those new lvls with the pak and not now and just have it stored away
till it comes out?
I go with what some say, have it to where when the pak comes out you need
one more kill or a few kills that give you exp to hit Lvl 51. I doubt I'll
be on Lvl 50 by then anyways cause I'm just taken my sweet time and getting
lvls when I get them and not rushing it. But if I do make it to 50 by then
and I have enough exp to go up a few lvls I wouldn't wanna see welcome to
Lvl 53 or higher before I get to play the new pak.
Ok thats all.

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 21 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************
